subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Dimitar Berbatov scored his first two goals for Manchester United in a 3-0 Champions League victory at Aalborg on Tuesday, and Real Madrid rode its luck in a 2-1 victory at Zenit St. Petersburg.
snippet: Dimitar Berbatov scored his first two goals for Manchester United in a 3-0 Champions League victory at Aalborg on Tuesday, and Real Madrid rode its luck in a 2-1 victory at Zenit St. Petersburg.
